registry.name: LeForge Official Registry
registry.description: Official ForgeHook plugins maintained by the LeForge team

manifest.name: QR Code & Barcode Generator
manifest.description: Generate QR codes and barcodes (Code128, EAN-13, UPC-A) with multiple output formats (SVG, Base64 PNG, matrix). Pure TypeScript implementation - zero external dependencies. Built into LeForge core.

endpoints.description: Generate QR code as Base64 PNG
Generate QR code as raw matrix

manifest.name: String Utilities
manifest.description: Lightweight string manipulation utilities including slugify, camelCase, truncate, sanitize HTML, and more. Runs embedded without Docker overhead.

manifest.name: Date Utilities
manifest.description: Lightweight date and time manipulation utilities including formatting, parsing, relative time, and date math. Runs embedded without Docker overhead.

manifest.name: Timezone Utilities
manifest.description: Convert times across timezones. Give it a time and get an array of times back in multiple zones. Supports 60+ major cities and all IANA timezones.

endpoints.description: Convert time to a single timezone
Get current time in multiple timezones

manifest.name: Unit Converter
manifest.description: Convert between units of measurement. Supports length (miles, km, meters, yards), weight (pounds, kg, ounces), volume, temperature, area, speed, and data sizes.

endpoints.description: Convert a value between two units
Convert a value to multiple units

manifest.name: Crypto Service
manifest.description: Cryptographic operations including hashing, encryption, and JWT token management. Supports SHA, bcrypt, argon2, AES-256-GCM encryption.

endpoints.description: Hash data using SHA, bcrypt, or argon2

manifest.name: Math Service
manifest.description: Advanced mathematical operations including arithmetic, statistics, matrix operations, equation solving, and numerical analysis.

endpoints.description: Calculate statistics (mean, median, std, variance, etc.)
Solve equations and systems of equations

manifest.name: PDF Service
manifest.description: PDF generation from HTML, merging, splitting, text extraction, and watermarking.

manifest.name: OCR Service
manifest.description: Optical character recognition for extracting text from images. Supports multiple languages and document layouts.

endpoints.description: Extract text with bounding boxes and confidence scores

manifest.name: Image Service
manifest.description: Image processing including resize, convert, optimize, crop, and format transformations using Sharp.

manifest.name: LLM Service
manifest.description: AI text generation and chat completions. Compatible with OpenAI API, Anthropic, and local models via Ollama/vLLM.

environment.name: OPENAI_API_BASE
environment.description: Custom OpenAI API base URL (for Ollama, vLLM, etc.)

manifest.name: Vector Service
manifest.description: Vector database operations for semantic search, RAG, and embeddings storage using Qdrant.

manifest.name: Data Transform Service
manifest.description: Data format conversions between JSON, CSV, XML, YAML, and more. Supports JSONPath queries and data validation.

manifest.name: UUID Utilities
manifest.description: Generate unique identifiers: UUID v1/v4/v5/v7, ULID, NanoID, CUID, Snowflake IDs. All generation is local with cryptographically secure randomness.

manifest.name: JSON Utilities
manifest.description: JSON manipulation: JSONPath queries, flatten/unflatten, deep merge, diff comparison, schema validation, and safe parsing. All operations run locally.

endpoints.description: Flatten nested object to single level
Compare two objects and return differences

manifest.name: Encoding Utilities
manifest.description: Data encoding and decoding: Base64, Base64URL, hex, URL encoding, HTML entities, JWT decoding (without verification). All operations run locally.

manifest.name: Formula Engine
manifest.description: Comprehensive Excel-compatible formula engine with 150+ functions spanning Math/Statistics, Logical, Text, Date/Time, Financial, and Lookup categories. Pure JavaScript implementation - zero external dependencies.

manifest.name: Azure Foundry Local
manifest.description: On-device AI inference using Azure Foundry Local. Provides access to local language models without cloud dependencies.
manifest.author: LeForge

endpoints.description: Generate chat completions using local AI models
Generate text embeddings for semantic search

manifest.name: LM Studio
manifest.description: Local AI inference using LM Studio. Provides an OpenAI-compatible API for running local models with a friendly GUI.
manifest.author: LeForge

manifest.name: Ollama
manifest.description: Local AI inference server for running open-source LLMs. Supports Llama 3.2, Mistral, Code Llama, Phi-3, Qwen, and more. Required for LeForge Agent Runtime.

endpoints.description: Generate text from a prompt using a local model
Chat with a local model using message format (supports tool calling)
Download a model from the Ollama library

manifest.name: On-Premises Connector
manifest.description: Secure gateway to on-premises databases, APIs, file shares, and Active Directory. Enables cloud workflows to access internal resources through Cloudflare Tunnel.

endpoints.description: Create or update a connection configuration
Execute SQL query against on-prem database
Proxy request to internal REST API
List files in on-prem file share
Read file from on-prem file share
Write file to on-prem file share

manifest.name: Streaming File Service
manifest.description: Enterprise-grade large file handling with chunked uploads/downloads, resumable transfers, multi-cloud storage streaming (S3, Azure Blob, GCS), and file transformations. Handles files of any size without memory constraints.

endpoints.description: Stream download with Range header support
Stream upload directly to cloud storage (S3/Azure/GCS)
Generate presigned URLs for direct browser uploads/downloads
Split large PDF into smaller files

manifest.name: Validation Utilities
manifest.description: Comprehensive format validation utilities for emails, phones, URLs, credit cards, IBANs, VAT numbers, and more. All validation runs locally with no external API calls.

endpoints.description: Validate credit card with Luhn algorithm

manifest.name: Content Filter
manifest.description: Profanity filtering and content moderation locally. No external API calls - uses local word lists. Includes PII detection and spam analysis.

endpoints.description: Analyze text for profanity with details

manifest.name: Excel Utilities
manifest.description: Parse and generate Excel (XLSX) and CSV files locally. Zero external dependencies - pure JavaScript implementation. Includes data manipulation functions.

endpoints.description: Parse CSV string to structured data
Aggregate column values (sum, avg, min, max)

manifest.name: Lorem Utilities
manifest.description: Generate placeholder text, fake data, and sample content locally. No external API calls - all generated deterministically or with local randomness.

endpoints.description: Generate themed placeholder (bacon, hipster, corporate, tech, pirate)
